data.description:
Enjoy Any Video in VR with Absolute Ease! 
Join our Discord for the latest updates and events: https://discord.gg/EkBTHxcdQp

Play Everything:
All format support: Compatible with every video formats and every codec
High resolutions: UHD, 4K, 8K and 12K playback
All projection types: fisheye, cubemap, equirectangular and cinema
All stereo modes: 2D, 3D Side by Side, 3D Top Bottom, Flat, 180°, 190°, 200°, 220°and 360°

Useful Innovations:
USB Supported (FAT32 & NTFS)
DLNA: Browse and play video files on devices attached to your home network
Local streaming: Cablelessly watch videos stored on PC, Mac or other local devices (Download: https://moonvrplayer.com/)
Hand-Tracking Control: No need for controllers; you can control everything with just a flick of your fingers.
Industry-Leading Virtual Cinematic Experience: Choose from 5 classic virtual environments and 1 artist environment, featuring dynamic lighting and advanced anti-aliasing for intricate details.
Innovative Mixed Reality (MR) Mode: Whether you want to hang the screen on your home wall or have the screen's light reflect into your real environment, Moon VR Player can make it happen.

Smooth and Stable:
Hardware acceleration: Accelerate  your GPU hardware to unleash its full potential
Special algorithms: Made for each different formats, including 3D videos

In-App Purchase Details:
Includes a virtual environment collaboratively created with an artist, requiring additional payment to support both the artist and our work.

changelog.change_log:
Updates:

The New Private Cinema Scene available now! Enjoy a more immersive experience!

Multilingual: Chinese, English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish.

Support embedded subtitle and SMB subtitle function.

Added screen sharpen function.

Add Stay Vertical switch, on by default, when Stay Vertical is on the user grabs the screen with the same feel and manner as in the past version; when Stay Vertical is off, the user can grab or even pull the screen closer at will.

Add the pupil distance adjustment function, for stereoscopic video can be manually adjusted on both sides of the screen to avoid double image.

Add button prompts, in specific operations or scenes, it will add operation prompts on the side of the handle, which is convenient for users to get started.

Add the Motion function, which is on by default and makes the screen not move with the user's head, and when it is off, the screen moves with the head.

Added the function of “Previous”&“Next”, you can jump to the previous or next video in the playback interface by buttons.

Optimized the logic and UI related to fast forward and rewind.

Optimized the logic of screen grabbing and resetting view angle.

Built-in test video for new or first-time installers to experience the player's features.

Fixed bugfixes in UI interaction details and other details.
